Container.Name: Cacherr
Container.Overview:
Cacherr - Advanced Plex media caching system with WebGUI management.
Security: The container limits ownership changes to its own application directory and does not modify host-mounted media or config permissions. Use dedicated directories for /config and /cache.
FEATURES: - ✅ Web interface with persistent settings across restarts - ✅ Plex validation with masked token display for security - ✅ Real-time logs display in WebGUI - ✅ Test mode for safe operation - ✅ Automatic cache management with symlinks - ✅ Multi-user watchlist support - ✅ Performance tuning controls
RECENT FIXES APPLIED: - ✅ Settings persistence across container restarts - ✅ Checkbox settings now save properly - ✅ Plex token/URL persist and don't reset to hardcoded values - ✅ WebGUI logs display correctly - ✅ Masked token display with working validation
MOUNT COMPATIBILITY: Uses identical mount paths as Plex container to prevent media visibility issues.
SAFE CONFIGURATION: Default paths use dedicated directories to prevent system damage.
COMMON SETUP PITFALLS (and fixes): - WebUI not reachable: ensure WEB_HOST=0.0.0.0 and WEB_PORT matches the container port mapping (Target=5445). - Dev redirect to :3000: set CACHERR_ENVIRONMENT=production (default) to serve the built UI. - Plex auth errors: include protocol and port in PLEX_URL (e.g., http://host:32400) and paste PLEX_TOKEN without quotes. - Permissions: do not map /config or /cache to system dirs; use dedicated appdata paths.

Config.Name: PLEX_URL
Config.Description: Plex server URL (include protocol and port), e.g. http://192.168.1.10:32400. Leave blank to configure in the WebGUI.

Config.Name: PLEX_TOKEN
Config.Description: Plex token (paste raw token without quotes). Leave blank to configure in the WebGUI.

Config.Name: PLEX_SOURCE
Config.Description: Inside-container path to your primary Plex media mount (should match the Path Target below). Default: /media.

Config.Name: Web Port
Config.Description: Web interface port (container). Match this with WEB_PORT below.

Config.Name: WEB_HOST
Config.Description: Host interface for the web server to bind. Use 0.0.0.0 so Unraid can reach it.

Config.Name: WEB_PORT
Config.Description: Internal web server port. Must match the container port mapping above (Target=5445 by default).

Config.Name: CACHERR_ENVIRONMENT
Config.Description: Runtime mode. Use 'production' to serve the built UI and avoid dev-server redirects.

Config.Name: LOG_LEVEL
Config.Description: Logging level: DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR.

Config.Name: AUTO_START_SCHEDULER
Config.Description: Automatically start background scheduler on boot.

Config.Name: Plex Media Path
Config.Description: Plex-compatible path for primary media (READ-ONLY). Default inside-container path is /media and should match PLEX_SOURCE.

Config.Name: Cache Directory
Config.Description: Dedicated cache directory - DO NOT use system directories

Config.Name: Config Directory
Config.Description: Dedicated config directory - DO NOT use system directories
